forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. North wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
As night settles over Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere exhales a gentle sigh of clarity. The air remains crisp, embracing a coolness that lingers around 50 degrees, a refreshing chill that hints at the tranquility of the evening. A soft breeze dances from the north, playfully brushing against the skin, suggesting a calmness that invites quiet contemplation. Tomorrow, the sun will rise with a promise of warmth, heralding a mostly sunny day that peaks near 70 degrees—a welcome shift as the city sheds the last remnants of winter’s chill.

The daytime warmth will soften in the afternoon, transitioning to a cool embrace as temperatures fall to the mid-60s, yet the prevailing winds from the northeast will maintain a pleasant touch. One might dress in layers—perhaps a light sweater or a jacket to match the morning coolness, layering down to a simple tee as the sun reaches its zenith. The scenery, unmarred by fog, reveals the city’s iconic landmarks in all their glory, inviting leisurely strolls along the waterfront or an exploration of the vibrant streets that pulse with life. A gentle evening stroll, perhaps a quiet visit to a local café, offers a perfect way to embrace the simple joys of urban life.
